name: Lattice
title: lattice.com
shortDescription: Lattice is an HR platform designed to streamline and automate operations while focusing on people-first, AI-powered solutions. It serves HR teams looking to manage, grow, and understand their workforce effectively. An example use case includes using Lattice to set company-wide goals, track progress, and use AI-powered insights to improve employee performance.
pros: Seamless integrations with existing tech stacks
Intuitive tools for pay and timecard management
cons: May require training for full feature utilization
Dependence on AI for critical insights
